disclaimer.title: Please confirm before proceeding
disclaimer.subtitle: In order for yout to best use the app, we ask you to confirm two important points:

bullet1.title: 1. The displayed data may be inaccurate
bullet1.text1: Currently, all reports come from the community. This data also forms the basis of the risk model. We cannot guarantee the completeness or accuracy of the displayed data.
bullet1.text2: In the near future, we will also include official BVG APIs to facilitate route planning based on official and reliable data.

bullet2.title: 2. Your privacy is important to us
bullet2.text: We do not save any of your personal information. For a detailed privacy policy, please consult our

disclaimer.endText: Now you're ready to get started. Thank you!

privacyPolicyUpdated.title: Privacy Policy Update
privacyPolicyUpdated.text: We have updated our Privacy Policy. We still do not store any personal data, your location or anything similar, but please review it anyway.
privacyPolicyUpdated.confirmText: By continuing, you agree to the new privacy policy.
